divs: Sighting DetailsStanding on front porch looking for the moon it was supposed to be clear that night when i look north and saw 5 red lights some were blinking with 3 in a triangular shape in the front with an shapeless orange light that seemed to be leading (not like the red which were points of light. sort of a blob shape to the light. Not round ) 2 red points of light horizontal in alignment in the back. the last light was blinking. [( *^..) crude shape but you should get the idea] moved together in a east to west direction. thought it was helicopter but this had no sound and no white or blue lights. so i thought maybe its military but still no sound. oh well, its a nice silent reeeeallllllly slow helicopter the Air Force has, i thought. i thought this until i heard about Morristown same red lights but Morristown didn't have the orange light. and the lights i saw stayed together. i really cant tell you the altitude but i know it was way under the cloud level. possibly within the standard helicopter altitude. if this is true it was larger than a standard helicopter from the orange light to the last red point of light which was blinking. i lost sight of it when it was so far west of my house it blended in with the city lights. I have included a very crude .bmp file to illustrate what i saw.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Euclid
There were no other sightings in Euclid on or around November 5th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 5 red lights, 3 in a triangular shape, 2 red points of light horizontal in alignment.
